greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Integral_{x=0..1} Product_{k>=1} (1-x^k)^3 dx.
comment: In general, Integral_{x=0..1} Product_{k>=1} (1-x^(m*k))^3 dx = Sum_{n>=0} (-1)^n * (2*n+1) / (m*n*(n+1)/2 + 1) is equal to
Integral_{x=-1..1} Product_{k>=1} (1-x^k)^3 dx = 2*Pi*(1 + sqrt(2) * cosh(sqrt(7)*Pi/4)) / cosh(sqrt(7)*Pi/2) = 1.32639350417409769439126... . - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 02 2015
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 29 2015
